title: UI Design Fundamentals
description: Learn the core principles of interface design, color theory, typography, and layout.

title: UX Research Essentials
description: Master the process of user interviews, personas, and usability testing to create user-centered designs.

title: Wireframing & Prototyping in Figma
description: Learn how to create effective wireframes and interactive prototypes using Figma.

title: Design Systems & Components
description: Build scalable design systems, reusable UI components, and maintain visual consistency.

title: User Journey Mapping
description: Understand how to visualize user flows and improve experiences with journey mapping.

title: Usability Testing & Heuristics
description: Test your designs with real users and apply usability heuristics to identify issues.

title: Mobile App UI Design
description: Design beautiful, responsive, and intuitive mobile app interfaces that delight users.

title: Accessibility in Design
description: Make your interfaces inclusive by applying accessibility guidelines (WCAG 2.1).

title: UI Animation & Microinteractions
description: Add motion and interactivity to enhance the user experience with delightful animations.

title: Portfolio & Case Study Building
description: Learn how to present your projects and build a professional UI/UX portfolio that stands out.
